## Example of Ignoring Workload Types in Reloader

```bash
# Ignore only Jobs
--ignored-workload-types=jobs

# Ignore only CronJobs
--ignored-workload-types=cronjobs

# Ignore both Jobs and CronJobs (comma-separated)
--ignored-workload-types=jobs,cronjobs
```

## CronJob with Automatic Reload Trigger

```yaml
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: backup-job
  annotations:
    reloader.stakater.com/auto: "true"
spec:
  schedule: "0 2 * * *"
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
            - name: backup
              image: backup-tool:latest
              envFrom:
                - configMapRef:
                    name: backup-config
                - secretRef:
                    name: backup-credentials
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: backup-config
data:
  backup.destination: "s3://my-backup-bucket"
  retention.days: "30"
```

## Apply Helm3 Labels and Annotations to Kubernetes Resources

```bash
KIND=ClusterRoleBinding
NAME=reloader-reloader-role-binding
RELEASE=reloader
NAMESPACE=kube-system
kubectl annotate $KIND $NAME meta.helm.sh/release-name=$RELEASE
kubectl annotate $KIND $NAME meta.helm.sh/release-namespace=$NAMESPACE
kubectl label $KIND $NAME app.kubernetes.io/managed-by=Helm

KIND=ClusterRole
NAME=reloader-reloader-role
RELEASE=reloader
NAMESPACE=kube-system
kubectl annotate $KIND $NAME meta.helm.sh/release-name=$RELEASE
kubectl annotate $KIND $NAME meta.helm.sh/release-namespace=$NAMESPACE
kubectl label $KIND $NAME app.kubernetes.io/managed-by=Helm
```

## Implement Kubernetes Controller for Resource Watching (Go)

```go
// internal/pkg/controller/controller.go - Controller pattern for resource watching
package controller

import (
	"github.com/stakater/Reloader/internal/pkg/handler"
	"k8s.io/client-go/kubernetes"
	"k8s.io/client-go/tools/cache"
)

// NewController creates a new controller for watching ConfigMaps or Secrets
func NewController(
	client kubernetes.Interface,
	resource string,
	namespace string,
	ignoredNamespaces []string,
	namespaceLabelSelector string,
	resourceLabelSelector string,
) (*Controller, error) {

	// Create work queue for handling events
	queue := workqueue.NewTypedRateLimitingQueue(
		workqueue.DefaultTypedControllerRateLimiter[any]())

	// Create informer with event handlers
	_, informer := cache.NewInformerWithOptions(cache.InformerOptions{
		ListerWatcher: listWatcher,
		ObjectType:    kube.ResourceMap[resource],
		ResyncPeriod:  0,
		Handler: cache.ResourceEventHandlerFuncs{
			AddFunc:    c.Add,      // Handle resource creation
			UpdateFunc: c.Update,   // Handle resource updates
			DeleteFunc: c.Delete,   // Handle resource deletion
		},
	})

	return &Controller{
		client:   client,
		informer: informer,
		queue:    queue,
	}, nil
}

// Run starts the controller
func (c *Controller) Run(threadiness int, stopCh chan struct{}) {
	go c.informer.Run(stopCh)

	// Wait for cache sync
	if !cache.WaitForCacheSync(stopCh, c.informer.HasSynced) {
		return
	}

	// Start workers
	for i := 0; i < threadiness; i++ {
		go wait.Until(c.runWorker, time.Second, stopCh)
	}

	<-stopCh
}

```

```yaml
kind: Kustomization

  - https://github.com/stakater/Reloader/deployments/kubernetes
```


## Kubernetes Deployment Configuration with Runtime Flags

```yaml
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: reloader
  namespace: reloader
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: reloader
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: reloader
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: reloader
      containers:
        - name: reloader
          image: stakater/reloader:v1.4.12
          args:
            - --reload-on-create=true
            - --reload-on-delete=true
            - --auto-reload-all=true
            - --reload-strategy=annotations
            - --ignored-workload-types=jobs,cronjobs
            - --namespace-selector=env=production
            - --resource-label-selector=watch=true
            - --namespaces-to-ignore=kube-system,kube-public
            - --log-format=json
            - --enable-pprof
            - --pprof-addr=:6060
          env:
            - name: ALERT_ON_RELOAD
              value: "true"
            - name: ALERT_SINK
              value: "webhook"
            - name: ALERT_WEBHOOK_URL
              value: "https://webhook.site/your-unique-id"
          ports:
            - containerPort: 9090
              name: metrics
            - containerPort: 6060
              name: pprof
          resources:
            limits:
              cpu: 150m
              memory: 512Mi
            requests:
              cpu: 10m
              memory: 128Mi
```

```bash
helm install reloader stakater/reloader -f values.yaml
```

```yaml
deployment.reloader.stakater.com/pause-period: "5m"
```
